<template>
	<transition name="el-fade-in-linear">
    <el-row class='container' v-if='showPage'>
      <el-col :span='11' class='poster-part'>
        hello
			</el-col>

			<el-col :span='13' class='login-part'>
			</el-col>
    </el-row>
  </transition>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      showPage: false
    }
  },
  mounted() {
    setTimeout(() => {
			this.showPage = true
		}, 500)
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
	.container {
		box-sizing: border-box;
		width: 100%;
		height: 100%;
	}

  .poster-part {
    height: 100%;
    box-shadow: 0px 4px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25);
  }
</style>
